verses.verse: Now it came to <S%H2346>pass<s%>, when the wall was <S%H1129>built<s%>, and I had set <S%H5975>up<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%>, and the <S%H7778>porters<s%> and the <S%H7891>singers<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> were <S%H6485>appointed<s%>,

that I gave my <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H2607>Hanani<s%>, and <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H8269>governor<s%> of the <S%H1002>castle<s%>, <S%H6680>charge<s%> over <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; for he was a <S%H571>faithful<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, and <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> above <S%H7227>many<s%>.

And I <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8179>them<s%>, Let not the gates of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> be <S%H6605>opened<s%> until the <S%H8121>sun<s%> be <S%H2527>hot<s%>; and while they stand on <S%H5975>guard<s%>, let them <S%H1479>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%>, and <S%H270>bar<s%> ye <S%H5975>them<s%>: and appoint <S%H4931>watches<s%> of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> in his <S%H4929>watch<s%>, and every <S%H376>one<s%> to be over against his <S%H1004>house<s%>.

Now the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H7342>wide<s%> and <S%H7342>large<s%>; but the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H8432>therein<s%>, and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> were not <S%H1129>builded<s%>.

And my <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> into my <S%H3820>heart<s%> to gather <S%H6908>together<s%> the <S%H2715>nobles<s%>, and the <S%H5461>rulers<s%>, and the <S%H5971>people<s%>, that they might be reckoned by <S%H3187>genealogy<s%>. And I <S%H4672>found<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H3188>genealogy<s%> of them that came <S%H5927>up<s%> at the <S%H7223>first<s%>, and I <S%H4672>found<s%> written <S%H3789>therein<s%>:

These are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H4082>province<s%>, that went <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H7628>captivity<s%> of those that had been carried <S%H1473>away<s%>, whom <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had carried <S%H1540>away<s%>, and that <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and to <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> unto his <S%H5892>city<s%>;

who <S%H935>came<s%> with <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%>, <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%>, <S%H5166>Nehemiah<s%>, <S%H5838>Azariah<s%>, <S%H7485>Raamiah<s%>, <S%H5167>Nahamani<s%>, <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%>, <S%H1114>Bilshan<s%>, <S%H4559>Mispereth<s%>, <S%H902>Bigvai<s%>, <S%H5149>Nehum<s%>, <S%H1196>Baanah<s%>. The <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H582>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6551>Parosh<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7657>seventy<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%>.
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8203>Shephatiah<s%>, <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%>.
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H733>Arah<s%>, <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%>.

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6355>Pahath-moab<s%>, of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%> and <S%H3097>Joab<s%>, two <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8083>eighteen<s%>.
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam<s%>, a <S%H505>thousand<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%>.

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2140>Zaccai<s%>, <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8346>threescore<s%>.

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5803>Azgad<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%>.

The <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%> and <S%H5857>Ai<s%>, a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%>.

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H5867>Elam<s%>, a <S%H505>thousand<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%>.

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3850>Lod<s%>, <S%H2307>Hadid<s%>, and <S%H207>Ono<s%>, <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%>.
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5570>Senaah<s%>, <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%>.

The <S%H3548>priests<s%>: The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3048>Jedaiah<s%>, of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%>, <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%>.

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6583>Pashhur<s%>, a <S%H505>thousand<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%>.
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2766>Harim<s%>, a <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seventeen<s%>.
The <S%H3881>Levites<s%>: the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%>, of <S%H6934>Kadmiel<s%>, of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1937>Hodevah<s%>, <S%H7657>seventy<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%>.
The <S%H7891>singers<s%>: the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%>, a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%>.

The <S%H7778>porters<s%>: the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H333>Ater<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2929>Talmon<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6126>Akkub<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2410>Hatita<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7630>Shobai<s%>, a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%>.
The <S%H5411>Nethinim<s%>: the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6727>Ziha<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2817>Hasupha<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2884>Tabbaoth<s%>,

the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1502>Gazzam<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5798>Uzza<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6454>Paseah<s%>.
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1153>Besai<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4586>Meunim<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5300>Nephushesim<s%>,
the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1227>Bakbuk<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2709>Hakupha<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2744>Harhur<s%>,
the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1213>Bazlith<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4240>Mehida<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2797>Harsha<s%>,
the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1302>Barkos<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5516>Sisera<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8547>Temah<s%>,
the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5335>Neziah<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2412>Hatipha<s%>.

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%>: the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5479>Sotai<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5618>Sophereth<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6514>Perida<s%>,
the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3279>Jaala<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1874>Darkon<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1435>Giddel<s%>,

the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8203>Shephatiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2411>Hattil<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6380>Pochereth-hazzebaim<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H526>Amon<s%>.
All the <S%H5411>Nethinim<s%>, and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%>, were <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8673>ninety<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%>.

And these were they that went <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H8528>Tel-melah<s%>, <S%H8521>Tel-harsha<s%>, <S%H3743>Cherub<s%>, <S%H114>Addon<s%>, and <S%H564>Immer<s%>; but they <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5046>show<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%>, nor their <S%H2233>seed<s%>, whether they were of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1806>Delaiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5353>Nekoda<s%>, <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%>.

And of the <S%H3548>priests<s%>: the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2252>Hobaiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6976>Hakkoz<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1271>Barzillai<s%>, who <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H1271>Barzillai<s%> the <S%H1569>Gileadite<s%>, and was <S%H7121>called<s%> after their <S%H8034>name<s%>.

These <S%H1245>sought<s%> their <S%H3791>register<s%> among those that were reckoned by <S%H3187>genealogy<s%>, but it was not <S%H4672>found<s%>: therefore were they deemed <S%H1351>polluted<s%> and put from the <S%H3550>priesthood<s%>.

And the <S%H8660>governor<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H398>them<s%>, that they should not eat of the <S%H6944>most<s%> holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, till there <S%H5975>stood<s%> up a <S%H3548>priest<s%> with <S%H224>Urim<s%> and <S%H8550>Thummim<s%>.
The whole <S%H6951>assembly<s%> <S%H259>together<s%> was <S%H702>forty<s%> and two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8346>threescore<s%>,

besides their <S%H5650>men-servants<s%> and their <S%H519>maid-servants<s%>, of whom there were <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%>: and they had two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> singing <S%H7891>men<s%> and singing <S%H7891>women<s%>.

Their <S%H5483>horses<s%> were <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%>; their <S%H6505>mules<s%>, two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%>;

their <S%H1581>camels<s%>, <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%>; their <S%H2543>asses<s%>, <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%>.

And some from among the <S%H7218>heads<s%> <S%H7117>of<s%> <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto the <S%H4399>work<s%>. The <S%H8660>governor<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H214>treasury<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1871>darics<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H4219>basins<s%>, <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%>' <S%H3801>garments<s%>.

And some of the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses <S%H5414>gave<s%> into the <S%H214>treasury<s%> of the <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H8147>twenty<s%> <S%H7239>thousand<s%> <S%H1871>darics<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and two <S%H505>thousand<s%> and two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H4488>pounds<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.

And that which the <S%H7611>rest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> was <S%H8147>twenty<s%> <S%H7239>thousand<s%> <S%H1871>darics<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H4488>pounds<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H8346>threescore<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%>' <S%H3801>garments<s%>.

So the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and the <S%H7778>porters<s%>, and the <S%H7891>singers<s%>, and some of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and the <S%H5411>Nethinim<s%>, and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities<s%>. And when the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H5060>come<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were in their <S%H5892>cities<s%>.
